original_text: They tie up heavy, cumbersome loads and put them on other people’s shoulders, but they themselves are not willing to lift a finger to move them.
korean_text: 또 무거운 짐을 묶어 사람의 어깨에 지우되 자기는 이것을 한 손가락으로도 움직이려 하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: They tie up heavy, cumbersome loads
and put them on other people's shoulders
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 다른 사람들의 어깨에 올려놓습니다

sentences.original_text: but they themselves are not willing
to lift a finger to move them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 옮기기 위해 손가락 하나 까딱할 생각을
